title: My game isn't working! ( help )
body: _So, for some reason, I can't play my game. It's saying it needs to be debugged. A visual studio by Microsoft is the only thing that's coming out. It's been like this for 3 days now and I tried everything. From deleting the game to restarting my computer.. I don't know I can't play it at all ;-; Please help me._

replies.body: No, I can't even log in. It began doing this a few days ago. It crashed a lot on the day before it got like this. The most far I got was the logo, but it only stays for a second before the pop up comes up about 'debugging the game'

That's really strange. By debugged are you meaning a *Bugsplat*? If so, our [Bugsplat & Crashing guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) is a good place to start in resolving this.

Let me know if you still have issues.
